headline: Verizon to be the first carrier to offer the new AI-powered Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses
summary: Revolutionary AI glasses will be available to Verizon customers, offering a new way to stay connected on the go[Breaking news] BASKING RIDGE, N.J., Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon announced it will be the first wireless carrier to offer the revolutionary new Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses, unveiled last week at Meta's annual Connect conference. This partnership will bring the next generation of wearable AI technology to Verizon customers, offering a seamless experience on the glasses

headline: Top Stock Reports for Alibaba, Bank of America & Verizon
summary: Today's Research Daily features new research reports on 16 major stocks, including Alibaba Group, Bank of America, and Verizon Communications, as well as a micro-cap stock, Flanigan's Enterprises.

headline: TechSee Appoints Leroy Williams to Advisory Board as Telecom Faces Rising AI Demands
summary: TechSee, the Visual Agentic AI company transforming customer experience for the telecommunication and consumer electronics industries, announced today the appointment of Leroy Williams, former EVP and Chief Growth and Innovation Officer at Optimum (Altice USA), to its Advisory Board. Williams brings deep expertise across telecom, consumer products, media, and technology, having led growth, brand, product, GTM, CX, and innovation strategies for some of the sector's most recognized companies inclu
